ComicInfo.Title: Cloak of Crimson- Soul of Dust!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Separated form the Ghost Rider, Johnny tries to explain to the demon about their symbiotic relationship, and how one would die without the other, but it falls upon def ears.
Thus it is up to Johnny to somehow trick the Rider into cooperating with him to become one once more!
